column5: I crossed the border at I Falls 4 times after June 1 without a passport and had no problem. Anyone else have a problem without a passport.
Hi Danceswithwaves, We crossed twice with passports no problem. How was getting back into the US? Have a great year.Thank you,Larry Mac
Water pretty cool, eh? Bill Krejca
funny, I was thinking the same thing
If he had a Lund he wouldn't have to dance with the waves.....LOL
